profile.name: Jody Glidden
profile.headline: Founder @ Postilize, Founder and Former CEO Introhive
profile.about:
Jody Glidden is a serial entrepreneur and an innovator in the field of generative AI, which uses machine learning to create engaging and personalized content for enterprises. He is the founder and CEO of Postilize, a company that launched in April 2023 and is changing how businesses build their base of loyal customers.

With over 25 years of experience in founding and leading B2B technology companies, Jody has a track record of delivering value, growth, and innovation to his clients and partners. He was also the founder of Introhive, the fastest growing revenue acceleration system that applies machine learning and automation to CRM. Introhive has won multiple awards and recognition, and is used by some of the world's largest and most secure companies. Jody is passionate about product, sales technology, and is always eager to learn, teach, and build. He is an E&Y Entrepreneur of the year finalist and holds multiple patents in many fields of software.

experience.title: Founder and CEO
experience.description:
Postilize uses generative AI to change how enterprises build their brand and base of loyal customers.
We just launched at the end of April and are excited to show the world a new and better way to build and scale their business.
Join our waitlist to try us out at http://www.postilize.com

experience.title: Founder
experience.description:
No longer working at Introhive
Introhive applies machine learning and automation to help turn CRM from a system of record to a system of value.  The technology measures meaningful relationships between companies and their clients and provides customer intelligence to teams.
It's used by some of the world's largest and most secure companies such as banks, law firms, global systems integrators, global accounting firms, and some of the hottest companies in Silicon Valley.
Follow me on twitter @jodyglidden

I took engaging masters level courses in new languages and technologies at the time such as Ruby on Rails, native Android, native iPhone, Hadoop, etc.  I also took various MBA business courses as part of my requirements. recommendations.name: Stewart Walchli
recommendations.description: Jody was an excellent partner, leader and communicator.  We worked together for several years, culminating in the sale of Chalk Media to RIM in 2009.  Under Jody's direction, we built an excellent product that was scalable to millions of users, a critical factor that lead to our acquisition by RIM.

recommendations.description: Coming from a tiny city, in a tiny province comes this whirlwind with a Titan's heart.  His connections are unparalled, his knowledge broad and deep.  He personifies execution and things that he touch always seem to succeed.
